doc.repnme: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Thursday, June 10, 1971 : Senegal - Technical and Agricultural Education Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International Development Association (IDA) held on Thursday, June 10, 1971 covers only the discussion on the Technical and Agricultural Education Credit for Senegal.
doc.docna: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Thursday, June 10, 1971 : Senegal - Technical and Agricultural Education Project
